name: Cold-Blooded Strike
description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Kaeya, equip this card.
After Kaeya equips this card, immediately use Frostgnaw once.
After your Kaeya, who has this card equipped, uses Frostgnaw, he heals himself for 2 HP. (Once per Round)
(You must have Kaeya in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionraw:
$[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1103]</color>, equip this card.
After $[A1103] equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S11032]</color> once.
After your $[A1103], who has this card equipped, uses <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[S11032]</color>, he heals himself for 2 HP. (Once per Round)
(You must have $[A1103] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionreplaced:
<color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>Kaeya</color>, equip this card.
After Kaeya equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>Frostgnaw</color> once.
After your Kaeya, who has this card equipped, uses <color=#FFFFFFFF>Frostgnaw</color>, he heals himself for 2 HP. (Once per Round)
(You must have Kaeya in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
source: Reward for inviting Kaeya to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives
